text: Google AdSense is a program that is run by Google. Google AdSense provides a way for publishers to earn money from their online content. It lets publishers that are part of Google Display Network show Internet advertisements that are targeted to the site content and the audience. The advertisements can have words, images, videos, or other media. The advertisements are hosted, sorted, and maintained by Google. Recently Google allows Android Developers to show AdSense ad in apications besides AdMob. ==References== Category:Google Category:Advertising Category:E-commerce
title: Google AdSense
